amendment.description: Amendment sought to make an across-the-board cut of 5% to all funding accounts in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part A of House Report 111-209 to make an across-the-board cut of 5% to all funding accounts in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 259 (Roll no. 580).
